mapper.select: SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,p.cateCode FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm WHERE p.SCODE = sm.SCODE ORDER BY p.PCODE DESC
SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,p.cateCode FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND catecode=#{catecode}
SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,p.cateCode,p.TODAY FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.TODAY = #{today}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,c.cateCode,p.TODAY FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,CATEGORY c where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND c.CATECODE = p.CATECODE AND c.CATECODE = #{cateCode} AND p.TODAY = #{today}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE,c.cateCodeRef ,c.cateCode,p.TODAY FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,CATEGORY c where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND c.CATECODE = p.CATECODE AND c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef} AND p.TODAY = #{today}
SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,p.cateCode,p.BEST FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.BEST = #{best}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,c.cateCode,c.CATECODEREF ,p.BEST FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,CATEGORY c where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.CATECODE = c.CATECODE AND c.CATECODEREF = #{cateCodeRef}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,c.cateCode,c.CATECODEREF ,p.BEST FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,CATEGORY c where p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.CATECODE = c.CATECODE AND c.CATECODEREF = #{cateCodeRef} AND p.BEST = #{best}
SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE,p.PCODE,p.scode FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm WHERE p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.PCODE = #{pcode}
SELECT DISTINCT pd.PCOLOR,p.PCODE FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,PRODUCT_DETAIL pd WHERE p.PCODE = pd.PCODE AND sm.SCODE = p.SCODE AND p.PCODE = #{pcode}
SELECT DISTINCT pd.PSIZE,p.PCODE FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm ,PRODUCT_DETAIL pd WHERE p.PCODE = pd.PCODE AND sm.SCODE = p.SCODE AND p.PCODE = #{pcode}

SELECT r.RCODE ,sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME ,o.P_DETAIL ,r.REVIEW ,r.UPDATEDATE,m.MID FROM ORDER_DETAIL o,PRODUCT p,REVIEW r,MEM m,STORE_MEM sm WHERE p.PCODE = o.PCODE AND r.PCODE = p.PCODE AND r.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND r.OCODE = o.OCODE AND r.MCODE = m.MCODE AND p.PCODE = #{pcode}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME ,pq.STATE ,pq.QUESTION ,pq.UPDATEDATE ,pq.ANSWER,m.MID FROM PRODUCT p ,PRODUCT_QNA pq ,STORE_MEM sm,MEM m WHERE sm.SCODE = pq.SCODE AND p.PCODE = pq.PCODE AND m.MCODE = pq.MCODE AND p.pCODE = #{pcode}

SELECT sm.SNAME ,p.PNAME, p.PPRICE, p.PCODE ,p.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName FROM PRODUCT p ,STORE_MEM sm, CATEGORY c WHERE p.SCODE = sm.SCODE AND p.cateCode = c.cateCode AND p.cateCode = #{cateCode} ORDER BY p.PCODE DESC
